phrases: I am breaking up with you.
I cannot go out with someone like you anymore!
Otani and I are breaking up?
Stuff like that is the very reason Otani is fed up with you!
Honestly, what the heck were thinking leaving your boyfriend behind,
It will be all right Risa-chan.
If you keep apologizing, I am sure he will forgive you.
I did not mean to cheat on him, but...
That really was the wrong thing to do.
There should be a limit to my stupidity.
I am sorry for going out with that other guy.
I am not going to do anything that stupid ever again.
You can go out as much as you want.
It is got nothing to do with me.
Please do not break up with me!
A man never goes back on his word.
There is no need to act all macho now!
This only happened because you did something you should not have, right?
That is why I am apologizing!
There are things that can be fixed with an apology, and things that cannot.
Then what do you want me to do?
You are a stranger to me from now on.
This is all a dream, right?
This is just a bad dream.
It is been a while since that last happened...
I guess it is really over, huh?
Koizumi, I am sorry I said such cruel things.
Is that what you asked me to come here for?!
So what are you planning to do?
You are really going to break up?
What do you mean, for how long?
The future does not look good.
That is why I am breaking up with her.
I worry about her so much that I cannot concentrate on my studies.
Even if you break up, will not you still worry about her?
I did not think he was that stubborn.
Besides, this is an important time for him.
I should not bother him anymore.
Do not tell me you are just going to leave it like this?
You are the one who helped me with the Hokkaido problem.
I want to help you too.
Thing are already over between us.
I forgot to give this to him.
I took the time to make it, so it is still okay to give it to him, right?
Otani Atsushi-sama, I support you in your test efforts.
Risa-chan sure is a nice girl.
But why did not she come in?
I wonder if Otani accepted my support package?
Koizumi-san, are you getting off now?
Oh, the boss asked for your availability for December.
I am going to be all alone this year...
Koizumi-san, do you want to come in to work on Christmas Eve?
We are all going to get together and have a party after we close.
Would you like to come too, Koizumi-san?
I heard that the old lady got really drunk last year and went completely wild.
Do not you want to see that?
What is this about the old lady?
I am taking out the trash!
If you are looking for Koizumi-san, she already left.
I was just on my way home from prep school.
You guys already broke up, after all...
I am 2 cm shorter than you?
What did you do that for?!
Do not play dumb with me.
Attacking Koizumi while she was asleep...
It was only because she looked so beautiful while she was sleeping...
Do not say something so embarrassing out loud!
I am 2 cm taller than you, are not I?!
And besides, just what do you want with Koizumi?!
I am not going to hold back anymore.
I wonder what he did with the coat?
As long as he is doing his best.
I am Koizumi Risa, and I will be singing an Umibouzu song!
I am going to be fine.
This is where Otani would usually break in and interject.
He would always make a silly face and shout Yeah!
I really want to see him.
You should take a break once in a while, you know.
Why do not you spend it with Risa-chan?
I saw her near the station not long ago.
She was with a boy around your height.
I am not going to hold back anymore.
I thought I could go on being normal without Otani,
I am just no good without Otani.
You sure fall over a lot for someone with such a big body.
I am not too sure about the recycled aspect of it, but thanks.
Once you finish with your exams, I am going to ask you out again.
Even if you dump me, or say you are breaking up with me, I am not going to give up.
So just focus on the entrance exams for now.
Forget that I said we would break up.
I seem to like you more than I thought.
If you are going to say something that nice to me,
Your face might be hidden, but everyone can see mine.
I have got do your best written on my back, do not I?
You really should do your best...
Let us make a run for it.
Oh... I did not get you a Christmas present.
But you already gave me something.
I did not give you anything.
I seem to like you more than I thought.
That was the best present ever.
I do not need anything else.
And so, we overcame that unprecedented crisis and entered the new year.
It is New Years Day and we are already late!
I only slept in because you called and woke me up at some odd hour!
You would be sad if I had not, though.
You guys are both late, as always.
Okay everyone, the lovey-dovey couple is here.
I thought this was my chance...
I am going to pray for them to break up again.
Haruka-senpai is being petty as always...
Otani and the others started seriously getting into pre-exam study,
Nobu-chan, this will go really well with that skirt you bought last time.
Everyone else is working so hard.
Is it okay for us to be doing stuff like this?
You are the only one who still has not decided on any future plans.
What course are you going to take at technical college?
Say, if Otani is going to be a teacher,
You will need to take an exam to get into a college specializing in early childhood education.
Say, what about going into fashion design?
You have got a good sense of style.
Well, I do like looking nice... but this and that are...
Ah, darling, I am on my way now.
Then you and Chiharu-chan will not be able to go to the same school!
I was sick the day of the exam.
He took too much cold medicine, and could not remember anything from about halfway through.
We cannot go to the same school.
I am sorry for breaking my promise.
Well, last year we decided to visit a university,
Want To come have some fun with us?
I am still a high school senior.
So are you going to apply here next year?
It would be great having a cute girl like you come to our school.
She is already got a guy?
Lots and lots of guys came and...
I will always be by your side, Tanaka-san.
What do you think I should do?
I am going to go to whichever school you go to, so do your best, okay?
So you are going to give up on your first-choice school?
I want to be with you, Suzuki-kun.
Even if you lower yourself to my level and change your first choice university,
Why would you say such a thing?
I could not keep my promise.
I am sure there are other guys who could protect you at college in my place.
I do not want to go to the same school just so you can protect me!
I want to be with you!
And yet, you say I can replace you...
What are you going to do?
Why does it have to be like this?
Cannot you two just go to the same school?
It is for her own good, and for my good too.
There is a literature professor who Tanaka-san really respects...
So to give up her first choice school for my sake...
I think when she works out what she really wants to do in the future,
I do not want that to happen.
So you said those things deliberately, Suzuki-kun?
Why did you try to act cool like that?
That is completely the wrong way to show her you care about her.
Why not just tell her the truth?
She would have been much happier that way.
You were being considerate of me to that extent...
I am going to keep studying, and get into the same school as you next year,
You have been sighing for a while now.
What is the meaning of life?
Well I am the only one who has not decided on anything!
After watching those two today, I realized I really need to decide now,
You will need to get yours into gear too for your exam prep.
What the heck am I thinking?!
This house has been infected by a level five virus.
What the heck is going on?!
Your father and sister are both feverish and sick, too.
Go and stay at a healthy friend's house for the night.
Otani, I am praying for you.
Why is this happening to me?
You have got to be kidding!
Do your best in the exams!
But it is already time for graduation!
Koizumi, this is not the time to cry.
We are going to be late for graduation!
